REGISTER.TITLE: Registrer
REGISTER.TESTIMONIAL_HEADER: All it takes is one step to move forward
REGISTER.TESTIMONIAL_CONTENT: You're one step away from engaging your customers, retaining them and finding new ones.
REGISTER.TERMS_ACCEPT: Ao criar uma conta, você concorda com nossos T & C e Privacy policy

COMPANY_NAME.LABEL: Nome da empresa
COMPANY_NAME.PLACEHOLDER: Enter your company name. eg: Wayne Enterprises
COMPANY_NAME.ERROR: Nome da empresa é muito curto

FULL_NAME.LABEL: Fullt navn
FULL_NAME.PLACEHOLDER: Skriv inn fullt navn. F. eks: Ola Nordmann

EMAIL.LABEL: Bedriftse-postadresse
EMAIL.PLACEHOLDER: Skriv inn din profesjonelle e-postadresse. F.eks: ola{'@'}olasbedrift.no
EMAIL.ERROR: Insira um endereço de e-mail comercial válido

PASSWORD.LABEL: Passord
PASSWORD.IS_INVALID_PASSWORD: Password should contain atleast 1 uppercase letter, 1 lowercase letter, 1 number and 1 special character

API.ERROR_MESSAGE: Kunne ikke koble til Woot Server, vennligst prøv igjen senere
